instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1502: What is A1502? A1502 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2014, Late 2013, Early 2015 with EMC 2875, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-3476, 820-3536, 820-4924..
definitions.820-3476: What is 820-3476? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: Macbook Pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>(<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3476</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A) No image
threads.message: Hi the board start and chime ,the backlight output give 49V on pin 1 Lvsd but no image no backlight ,try 2 different screens still same ,<SIGNAL>PP_VCORE</SIGNAL> is 1.8V ,Lcd connector looks fine no corrosion or damage,I also getting 5V on L8300

threads.title: Macbook Pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>(<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3476</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A) No image
threads.message:
49V means no load on the backlight. There must be an image else there would be no 49V and 5V on L8300. Hold a flashlight to the apple logo.
Measure continuity from pin 1 to the end of a separate LCD cable, I bet the connector is fucked.

threads.title: Macbook Pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>(<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3476</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A) No image
threads.message: Its very strange situation again ,replace screen and works ok,I put that same screen in another macbook working perfect .Just to say that all same models <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> just one is from 2013,second 2014 whats the difference

threads.title: Macbook Pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>(<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3476</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A) No image
threads.message: 2013/14 are the same. 2015 with force click trackpad is the model that is different.
